on reading compounds: 趨向【スウコウ】tendency, trend, current
拝趨【ハイスウ】to visit someone, to call on
帰趨【キスウ】outcome (of a course of events), consequence, tendency, trend, drift
kun reading compounds: 帰趨【きすう】outcome (of a course of events), consequence, tendency, trend, drift

赴く【おもむく】to go in the direction of, to proceed toward, to proceed according to, to repair to, to betake oneself to, to become, to face (facts, circumstances, etc.), to abide by, to agree to, to consent to, to obey

走る【はしる】to run, to travel (movement of vehicles), to drive, to flow (e.g. energy), to hurry to, to retreat (from battle), to take flight, to run away from home, to elope, to tend heavily toward, to flash, to streak, to shoot through (e.g. pain), to get involved, to take (to something), to get wrapped up in
